title: Papers
text:
In this section, I present selected papers that I completed throughout my first year at the Bachelor of Information.

Course: “INF312 - Worlds Become Data”


Hari Lee Robledo, 2024, “Do Lower-Income Wards and Older Apartment Buildings Obtain Lower Apartment Building Evaluation Scores? An Analysis of the 2023 Apartment Building Evaluation Scores”. Course Paper, INF312 - World Becomes Data. [available]*
Francesca Ye, Sky Suh, Hari Lee Robledo, 2024, “Men and Women Both Prefer and Perceive Inaction as More Competent”. Course Paper, INF312 - World Becomes Data. [available]*


Course: “INF353 - Interactive Design Systems Studio”


Francesca Ye, Hari Lee Robledo. 2024. Large Display Interactive System Design: Chick-fil-A. Design Report, INF353H – Interactive Design Systems Studio. [available]*


Course: “INF352 - Information Design Studio”


Mingjia Chen, Hari Lee Robledo., et al. 2023. Design Project - UofT Campus Safety App. Design Report, INF352H – Information Design Studio. [available]*

title: About Hari
text:
Hello! I am Hari,

I am a third-year Bachelor of Information student at the University of Toronto. Before starting at the Faculty of Information, I was specializing in Digital Enterprise Management, where I learned how to use digital technologies to solve business management and organizational problems in creative and innovative ways. Now, I am exploring technology through a user-centric design lens and learning how to translate data into impactful projects.
